listing_jobDesc: Job Description :1. Design and Build sophisticated and highly salable apps using Flutter.2. Translate and Build the designs into high-quality responsive UI code.3. Write efficient queries for core Data.4. Use of Model-View-Controller (MVC) and Model-View-ViewModel-Controller (MVVM) architecture and development maintainable, testable, and functional software that meets product requirements.5. Resolve any problems existing in the system and suggest and add new features to the complete system.6. Follow the best practices while developing the app.7. Use CI/CD for smooth deployment.8. Document the project and code efficiently.9. Manage the code and project on Git in order to keep in sync with other team members and managers.10. Suggest new features and/or enhancements.11. Maintaining software through product life cycle including design, development, verification, and bug fixes.12. Write tests for the App.13. Knowledge of different state management libraries like BloC, GetX, and Provider will be a plus point.Job Type: Full-timeSalary: ₹20,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per monthBenefits:Health insuranceInternet reimbursementSchedule:Morning shiftSupplemental pay types:Commission payJoining bonusOvertime payPerformance bonusQuarterly bonusShift allowanceYearly bonusAbility to commute/relocate:Tilak Nagar, Delhi, Delhi: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)Education:Bachelor's (Preferred)Experience:Mobile applications: 1 year (Preferred)Expected Start Date: 16/08/2022 Job Description :1. JD: Mobile Engineer - Kotlin and Swift.Who are we looking for?Repos is a technology company which is constantly innovating new technologies, making sure the world benefits from it. We invest and develop advances in technology and bring together the best of the creative people to bring valuable technological solutions.Here’s what we are looking for,Someone who will be responsible for writing clean and efficient codes for Mobile applications. Who will monitor the performance of live apps and work on optimizing them at the code level. Also identify and resolve bottlenecks, rectify bugs and enhance application performance.We are also looking for someone who can contribute in uplifting the music and food choices of the company. Someone who can party at 1AM post work!What will you be doing?You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build and extend consumer and/or partner facing new products, platforms and features.Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app releases are always worthy of five- star ratings.Monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.Evaluate newmobile methodologies and technologies.Build reusable android software components for the platform.What will you needStrong technical Mobile Development.Expert-level knowledge of Java, Kotlin and Swift programming language.Strong problem-solving skills.Experience with launching apps to the App store.Curiosity to tinker around, explore new paradigms and strong zest for continuous improvement.Idea/experience of unit and instrumentation testing in Android E2E App development and/or experience of developing SDKs is good to have.Using some of the latest advancements in the world of Android such as Kotlin, MVVM,Data Binding, Dagger 2, Live Data, Room, and Swift.You should be willing to adapt to change and contribute to the Repos Way .How do we work at Repos?Like an organism!Where no one needs to be prompted to do something, everyone being well aware of their responsibilities, go ahead and do their job as efficiently as they can!We are often asked, “Why should one work in Repos?”And trust us, it is one of the simplest questions we are being asked!Why won’t one want to work with us?1. One will get to be a part of an effective change2. One gets to work with mad, passionate and curious people3. One gets full creative and intellectual freedom to workAt Repos, we are creating a community of youngsters at heart who are chasing their dreams everyday. Which is why we don’t have any motivating “team-building” activities but more calming and balancing activities like meditation!We are a 100% performance driven organism, for we are building leaders who will be responsible for the good changes which will be brought tomorrow!Job Type: Full-timeSalary: ₹400,000.00 - ₹1,600,000.00 per yearJadwal:Day shiftTunjangan:Health insurancePaid time offApplication Question(s):Are you available to join immediately or within a month?Education:Bachelor's (Preferred)Experience:Kotlin: 2 years (Preferred)Swift: 2 years (Preferred) JD: Mobile Engineer - Kotlin and Swift.Who are we looking for?Repos is a technology company which is constantly innovating new technologies, making sure the world benefits from it. Role: Mobile App Developer
Siemens founded the new business unit Siemens Advanta (formerly known as Siemens IoT Services) on April 1, 2019 with its headquarter in Munich, Germany. It has been crafted to unlock the digital future of its clients by offering end-to-end support on their outstanding digitalization journey. Siemens Advanta is a strategic advisor and a trusted implementation partner in digital transformation and industrial IoT with a global network of more than 8000 employees in 10 countries and 21 offices. Highly skilled and authoritative specialists offer services which range from consulting to craft & prototyping to solution & implementation and operation - everything out of one hand!
What part will you play?
Must have knowledge and hands-on experience in Hybrid mobile app development frameworks like Ionic, hands-on experience in Angular, Capacitor, Cordova, iOS development, Android development.
Good Exposure in HTML5 / CSS / TypeScript / JavaScript, CI/CD tools, Code Analysis, and Test automation and experience in consuming RESTful services.
You will be part of the development team and responsible for technical deliverables with quality.
Use your skills to move the world forward!
Experience of 2 to 4 Years of Experience in Software Development and minimum 2 Years of experience in Mobile Application Development.
An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech with 2 to 4 Years of Relevant experience in Mobile Application Development.
Knowledge and experience of UI and UX best practices for web applications.
Understanding of micro-services architecture, and the role of REST services is essential.
Exposure of development best practices, architectural concepts, and relevant design pattern
Make your mark in our exciting world at Siemens.
This role is based in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come. We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we encourage applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and imagination and help us shape tomorrow.
Find out more about Siemens careers at: www.siemens.com/careers

Job title: Hybrid Mobile Developer
Siemens founded the new business unit Siemens Advanta (formerly known as Siemens IoT Services) on April 1, 2019 with its headquarter in Munich, Germany. It has been crafted to unlock the digital future of its clients by offering end-to-end support on their outstanding digitalization journey. Siemens Advanta is a strategic advisor and a trusted implementation partner in digital transformation and industrial IoT with a global network of more than 8000 employees in 10 countries and 21 offices. Highly skilled and authority specialists offer services which range from consulting to craft & prototyping to solution & implementation and operation – everything out of one hand!
Before our software developers write even a single line of code, they have to understand what drives our customers. What is the environment? What is the user story based on? Implementation means – trying, testing, and improving outcomes until a final solution emerges. Knowledge means exchange – discussions with colleagues from all over the world. Join our Digitalization Technology and Services (DTS) team based in Bangalore and enjoy the freedom to think in completely new categories!
This is your role. What part will you play?
Development/Maintenance of Software/Apps for Digitalization of Factories
Implement interface requirements as discussed and agreed with relevant partners
Code Review and Drive Testability improvements sought at quality and efficiency
Root cause analysis and bugs correction
Advise and supervise dependencies on other teams, Produce user documentation
Participate on regular status meetings, should possess good
Analytical capabilities, ability to learn quickly and interpersonal skills
Abstraction capability and logical thinking
Social competence: the ability to work in teams and excellent communication skills
Customer-focused behavior, solution-focused, proactive action and initiative

We don’t need hard workers, just super minds
You must have Qualification: BE / B.Tech / MCA / ME / M.Tech with minimum 3-5 years of Experience in Hybrid Mobile App Development with Cordova and Angular
Very strong experience in Cross platform app development for iOS, Android based on Cordova
Good hands-on experience in web techniques for developing HTML-based apps, like JavaScript, Angular 2+, Typescript, OnsenUI / Ionic
Good knowledge of relational databases in SQL / SQLite
Experience in consuming web services on a mobile device.
Knowledge of current data structures for web-based applications (JSON, XML)
Knowledge in below areas will have higher edge
Version control (GIT, TFS), Continuous Integration tools (Jenkins, GitLab)
Hands on experience on Native Code development for Plugins customization.
Cross platform app development for Windows based on Cordova

We’ve got quite a lot to offer. How about you?
This role is in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries – and the craft of things to come.
We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we encourage applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us craft tomorrow.
Find out more about Siemens at: www.siemens.com/careers
At Siemens, we are always challenging ourselves to build a better future. We need the most innovative and diverse Digital Minds to develop tomorrow ‘s reality. Find out more about
Digital world of Siemens here: www.siemens.com/careers/digitalminds

job_title: Mobile Application Developer Jobs in Delhi Ncr
listing_jobDesc:
We are looking for a Mobile App Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include implementing visual elements and their behaviors with user interactions. You will work with both front-end and back-end web developers to build all client-side logic. You will also be bridging the gap between the visual elements and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both sides, and defining how the application looks and functions.
Responsibilities and Duties
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end services
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Strong understanding of JavaScript, its quirks, and workarounds
HTML5and CSS3
AngularJS, ReactJS
AJAX
code versioning tools, such as Git.
Benefits
Training, Mentoring
Tea/Coffee

About Lio


Lio is one app for all your data. For people from all walks of life, be it small entrepreneurs, students, farmers, homemakers, and many others, Lio strives to put all these people at ease when handling a large quantum of data.


As represented in our logo, the dot, bindu, stands for the first unit of life and when combined with other dots from our ecosystem it is the starting point of bringing our life in order. When extended, it transforms into lines which form rows and columns that further help organize our lives. Our identity embodies our vision, helps us stay true to our conception and is derived from a simple and basic unit of life to systematize everything.


Lio helps its users organize their data efficiently on their mobile phones. The problem the company is addressing is the lack of high-quality data creation & sharing software built for the mobile first user. Lio is used for a variety of tabulation, calculation and organizing needs, such as creating tables of customer/stock/payment data for businesses or organizing to-do lists, class schedules/wedding registries. The product is currently available in India/ Indonesia, rest countries to follow soon.

We are growing rapidly and we look for people who are ready to evolve with us and work in a fast paced environment. If that’s you, let's have a chat? If not convinced yet, read below some of our benefits.
Why Explore a Career at Lio

Growth - Join a team that gives you plenty of opportunities and abilities to do cutting-edge work while giving you the freedom and the platform to not just share your ideas but also to execute them.
Scope - Since Lio is growing rapidly, it makes for a golden opportunity to join the pilot team, which would also catapult your career growth
Passion - Opportunity to work with colleagues with a new and innovative way of thinking, positive energy and excitement.
Job variety - Working with us, you will never face a dull, boring routine as every day brings new challenges and opportunities.
Our Culture - We value diversity and hire to enrich our teams with new ideas and perspectives. We are an equal opportunity employer and don’t believe in discrimination of any kind. We offer a flat and transparent work culture where you are encouraged to communicate openly and share opinions irrespective of your role or designation.
Remote Work - We promote remote work as it enables the company with improved inclusivity and embraces diversity. You are free to work from the comforts of your home, or any place you choose to and enjoy a healthy work-life balance.
Compensation - We believe in getting the right talent, period. We won’t disappoint you on this.
About the Role
Mobile Developer/Senior Mobile Developer (React Native)

We are looking for a Mobile developer (React Native) across various levels (Software Developer /Senior Software developer /Team Lead) depending on experience who will take a key role in our core engineering team.
Roles/Responsibilities

Working alongside other developers, product managers and designers
Own a feature and bring it to the production application.
Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks.
Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
Writing clean, readable, and testable code

Skills Required

Must have hands-on working exp on React-Native and different packages.
Strong working knowledge on React Native and Redux
Experience on REST with JSON.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Experience in building and supporting high-performance applications
Java/Swift Knowledge to create a native bridge is a plus.
Prior experience with Firebase is a plus.
Javascript, React Native, Software Architecture, Mobile Development, Unit Testing, Swift, Java
Experience- 3-4 years of experience About Lio

companyName: Mercedes-Benz Research and Development India Private Limited
listing_jobDesc:
Aufgaben
Job Description:

Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.

Collaborating with the design team to define app features.

Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.

Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.

Fixing application bugs before the final release.

Publishing application on App Store.

Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.

Designing and implementing application updates
Qualifikationen
Qualification:

Proficient in Objective-C, Swift 4.X, and Cocoa Touch.

Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.

Knowledge of iOS back-end services.

Knowledge of Apple’s design principles and application interface guidelines.

Proficient in code versioning tools including Git.

Knowledge of C-based libraries.

Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.

Experience with continuous integration ,Fastlane ,Jenkins

Experience with third-party libraries and APIs

Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies

Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle

Proven experience as an app developer. Aufgaben

Proven experience as an app developer. Aufgaben
Job Description:

Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.

Collaborating with the design team to define app features.

Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.

Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.

Fixing application bugs before the final release.

Publishing application on App Store.

Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.

Designing and implementing application updates
Qualifikationen
Qualification:

Proficient in Objective-C, Swift 4.X, and Cocoa Touch.

Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.

Knowledge of iOS back-end services.

Knowledge of Apple’s design principles and application interface guidelines.

Proficient in code versioning tools including Git.

Knowledge of C-based libraries.

Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.

Experience with continuous integration ,Fastlane ,Jenkins

Experience with third-party libraries and APIs

Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies

Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle

Proven experience as an app developer. Aufgaben

We’re actively hiring great technical talent in the Surat area. This is a quickly growing team and a great chance to make a big impact.

This person will be responsible for contributing to local as well as outsourced clients’ mobile software development projects. The technologies and environments differ, although typically Android focused and using Agile techniques.

What You’ll Do:

Develop high quality software using cutting edge technologies and practices
Understand and work within the different framework structure
Collaborate with team members to work towards a Definition of Done on Agile projects
Attend daily stand ups and other timeboxed meetings
Work side-by-side with quality assurance personnel to efficiently produce high-quality software
Contribute to knowledge sharing opportunities within PALSOFT India and the community

What We’re Looking for:

Team player (low ego, ability to effectively swarm issues, etc.)
Ability to communicate with team members
Strong understanding of the web
Strong experience in at least some of the following
Android app with Android Studio / Eclipse
MVC
HTML, JavaScript and CSS
jQuery
SQLLite DB or MySQL
Other :
Experience : 1-3 Yrs
Type Of Job : Full Time
Designation : Mobile App Developer
Education : Any Graduate [BE / BTech / MCA / MSc-IT etc]
Professional Courses in Android Mobile technology
Annual Compensation: Rs. 1L – Rs. 3L [As per experience and expertise]
Send your CV at [career@palsoft.co.in]
Who We Are:
We’re passionate and multidimensional. We’re real people with real lives outside work. We believe everyone has knowledge to share and always learn new things. We strive to be a strategic asset for our clients as they tackle challenges in their business and technology.

We do this by investing in our staff. We develop and apply appropriate strategies to technology problems that help our clients build and maintain competitive advantage. Our mission is to create SMART [Simply Manageable Analytic Responsive Technology] computing system by improve lives through this work:

Software Development Consulting – we help our clients build software and learn best practices
Comprehensive Software Development – we build software for our clients through our in-house Development Center using Agile techniques We’re actively hiring great technical talent in the Surat area. This is a quickly growing team and a great chance to make a big impact.

Job title
Mobile App Developer
Description
Wonksknow India, a subsidiary of Wonksknow LLC USA, is looking for highly energetic and talented software developers to work on development of promising and innovative EdOptim and RaiseHand branded software applications. Wonksknow is very selective and the acceptance rate for this profile is less than 5%. If required, rigorous training is provided to the selected candidates. This is a full time role. Wonksknow developer salaries are very competitive.

Key Responsibilities: Contribute in various EdOptim and RaiseHand software development projects which includes products for Education, Human Resources and web conferencing solutions.
Requirements:
Excellent communication skills. Excellent clarity of thought.
Someone who can explain complex concepts in simple ways.
Will need to be incredibly patient.
Incredible customer service skills.
Familiarity with at least one object oriented programming language.
Knowledge of Java, Android development, Objective C, iOS Development, Flutter is preferred but not required.
4 years Bachelor's degree in a technical field or a Master's degree in any Science, Mathematics or Technical fields is required.
Flexible to work in morning, evening and night shifts.
Ability to self-learn, Confident and friendly.

Looking for a mobile app developer who has good experience in Iconic, Angular, CSS, Flutter, etc.

Designation: Mobile App Developer
Experience: 1-2 Years
Location: Jodhpur
About Us: Lucid Outsourcing Solutions, an ISO 9001:2015, is an offshore web design and development solutions provider that operates through its corporate office at Jodhpur.
Job Description:
We are looking for a qualified Mobile developer to join our Engineering team. You will be working with our engineers to develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications. As a Mobile app developer, you’ll collaborate with internal teams to develop functional mobile applications while working in a fast-paced environment.
Responsibilities:
Write clean and efficient codes for mobile applications.
Design and build advanced applications for this platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Work with outside data sources and APIs.
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
Developing mobile applications with Ionic, Angular, Flutter, CSS, HTML 5, JavaScript, and other broadly used Web development technologies

Requirements:
You have a Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
You have proven working experience in Mobile app development.
You are a problem solver with good analytical skills.

CTC - Depends on Experience. Looking for a mobile app developer who has good experience in Iconic, Angular, CSS, Flutter, etc.

About Lio


Lio is one app for all your data. For people from all walks of life, be it small entrepreneurs, students, farmers, homemakers, and many others, Lio strives to put all these people at ease when handling a large quantum of data.


As represented in our logo, the dot, bindu, stands for the first unit of life and when combined with other dots from our ecosystem it is the starting point of bringing our life in order. When extended, it transforms into lines which form rows and columns that further help organize our lives. Our identity embodies our vision, helps us stay true to our conception and is derived from a simple and basic unit of life to systematize everything.


Lio helps its users organize their data efficiently on their mobile phones. The problem the company is addressing is the lack of high-quality data creation & sharing software built for the mobile first user. Lio is used for a variety of tabulation, calculation and organizing needs, such as creating tables of customer/stock/payment data for businesses or organizing to-do lists, class schedules/wedding registries. The product is currently available in India/ Indonesia, rest countries to follow soon.

We are growing rapidly and we look for people who are ready to evolve with us and work in a fast paced environment. If that’s you, let's have a chat? If not convinced yet, read below some of our benefits.
Why Explore a Career at Lio

Growth - Join a team that gives you plenty of opportunities and abilities to do cutting-edge work while giving you the freedom and the platform to not just share your ideas but also to execute them.
Scope - Since Lio is growing rapidly, it makes for a golden opportunity to join the pilot team, which would also catapult your career growth
Passion - Opportunity to work with colleagues with a new and innovative way of thinking, positive energy and excitement.
Job variety - Working with us, you will never face a dull, boring routine as every day brings new challenges and opportunities.
Our Culture - We value diversity and hire to enrich our teams with new ideas and perspectives. We are an equal opportunity employer and don’t believe in discrimination of any kind. We offer a flat and transparent work culture where you are encouraged to communicate openly and share opinions irrespective of your role or designation.
Remote Work - We promote remote work as it enables the company with improved inclusivity and embraces diversity. You are free to work from the comforts of your home, or any place you choose to and enjoy a healthy work-life balance.
Compensation - We believe in getting the right talent, period. We won’t disappoint you on this.
About the Role
Mobile Developer/Senior Mobile Developer (React Native)

We are looking for a Mobile developer (React Native) across various levels (Software Developer /Senior Software developer /Team Lead) depending on experience who will take a key role in our core engineering team.
Roles/Responsibilities

Working alongside other developers, product managers and designers
Own a feature and bring it to the production application.
Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks.
Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
Writing clean, readable, and testable code

Skills Required

Must have hands-on working exp on React-Native and different packages.
Strong working knowledge on React Native and Redux
Experience on REST with JSON.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Experience in building and supporting high-performance applications
Java/Swift Knowledge to create a native bridge is a plus.
Prior experience with Firebase is a plus.
Javascript, React Native, Software Architecture, Mobile Development, Unit Testing, Swift, Java
Experience- 3-4 years of experience About Lio

Roles/Responsibilities

Working alongside other developers, product managers and designers
Own a feature and bring it to the production application.
Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks.
Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
Writing clean, readable, and testable code

Skills Required

Must have hands-on working exp on React-Native and different packages.
Strong working knowledge on React Native and Redux
Experience on REST with JSON.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Experience in building and supporting high-performance applications
Java/Swift Knowledge to create a native bridge is a plus.
Prior experience with Firebase is a plus.
Javascript, React Native, Software Architecture, Mobile Development, Unit Testing, Swift, Java
Experience- 3-4 years of experience Show more

Role: Senior Mobile App Developer
Siemens founded the new business unit Siemens Advanta (formerly known as Siemens IoT Services) on April 1, 2019 with its headquarter in Munich, Germany. It has been crafted to unlock the digital future of its clients by offering end-to-end support on their outstanding digitalization journey. Siemens Advanta is a strategic advisor and a trusted implementation partner in digital transformation and industrial IoT with a global network of more than 8000 employees in 10 countries and 21 offices. Highly skilled and authoritative specialists offer services which range from consulting to craft & prototyping to solution & implementation and operation - everything out of one hand!
What part will you play?
We are looking for a strong mobile app developer who welcomes both engineering and maintenance tasks. The primary focus will be to implement new user interfaces and features together with automated unit and integration tests.
You will be working with our candid and collaborative team, where your knowledge and advice about application architecture and the newest mobile technologies will be highly appreciated. The code you write will need to be cleanly organized and of the highest quality. You’ll also help ensure solid application performance and an excellent user experience.
You will be part of the development team and responsible for technical deliverables with quality.
Use your skills to move the world forward!
Experience of 4 to 6 Years of Experience in Software Development and minimum 2 Years of experience in Mobile Application Development.
Must have knowledge and hands-on experience in Hybrid mobile app development frameworks like Ionic, hands-on experience in Angular, Capacitor, Cordova, iOS development, Android development.
Good Exposure in HTML5 / CSS / TypeScript / JavaScript, CI/CD tools, Code Analysis, and Test automation and experience in consuming RESTful services.
An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech with 4 to 6 Years of Proven experience in Mobile Application Development.
Knowledge and experience of UI and UX standard methodologies for web applications.
Understanding of micro-services architecture, and the role of REST services is essential.
Exposure of development best practices, architectural concepts, and relevant design pattern
Make your mark in our exciting world at Siemens.
This role is based in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come. We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we encourage applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and imagination and help us shape tomorrow.
Find out more about Siemens careers at: www.siemens.com/careers

job_title: Senior SW Developer - Mobile Development (Qt Developer)
listing_jobDesc:
Quality focus
 Ensure that deliverables are implemented with industry best practices and as per the defined designs.
 Accountable and responsible for adequate unit test coverage for the software in own scope as part of the implementation process to ensure early quality.
 Accountable for passing build (warnings and errors in compilation)
 Accountable and responsible to ensure that SW features are well documented using the agreed tools
 Ensure that defects are fixed according to defect process and in a timely manner
Collaboration focus
 Software Developer works as part of agile teams co-operating with other developers and testers as well as the Product Owner. SW developers carry a general awareness of team level competencies (as in “T-shaped” profiles) and processes
 Handles code reviews in the team
 Continuously looks for improvement opportunities in own area and shares them with rest of the team.
Planning focus
 Responsible for participating and actively contributing to agile ceremonies such as daily stand ups, sprint planning and quarterly planning
 Software Developer participates to backlog grooming and story estimations
At KONE, we are focused on creating an innovative and collaborative working culture where we value the contribution of each individual. Employee engagement is a key focus area for us and we encourage participation and the sharing of information and ideas. Sustainability is an integral part of our culture and the daily practice. We follow ethical business practices and we seek to develop a culture of working together where co-workers trust and respect each other and good performance is recognized. In being a great place to work, we are proud to offer a range of experiences and opportunities that will help you to achieve your career and personal goals and enable you to live a healthy and balanced life.

Job description
Roles and Responsibilities
Developing new features and user interfaces from wireframe models
Ensuring the best performance and user experience of the application
Fixing bugs and performance problems
Writing clean, readable, and testable code
Cooperating with back-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team to deliver well-architected and high-quality solutions
Desired Candidate Profile

Responsibilities

Mobile App Developer who having sound knowledge of Android or Xcode
Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
Design interfaces to improve user experience
Liaise with Product development team to plan new features
Ensure new and legacy applications meet quality standards
Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocols
Stay up-to-date with new technology trends

Requirements

Proven work experience as a Mobile developer
Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Android market
In-depth knowledge of at least one programming language like Swift and Java
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
Ability to perform in a team environment Interested candidate please send CV at info@silverglobesoft.com

companyName: Mercedes-Benz Research and Development India Private Limited
listing_jobDesc:
Aufgaben
Job Description:

Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.

Collaborating with the design team to define app features.

Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.

Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.

Fixing application bugs before the final release.

Publishing application on App Store.

Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.

Designing and implementing application updates
Qualifikationen
Qualification:

Proficient in Objective-C, Swift 4.X, and Cocoa Touch.

Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.

Knowledge of iOS back-end services.

Knowledge of Apple’s design principles and application interface guidelines.

Proficient in code versioning tools including Git.

Knowledge of C-based libraries.

Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.

Experience with continuous integration ,Fastlane ,Jenkins

Experience with third-party libraries and APIs

Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies

Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle

Proven experience as an app developer. Aufgaben

Level - 2+years Experience
Job type - Full Time
Education
BE/B.Tech - CS/IS (Aggregate 65%)
M.Tech - CS/IS (Aggregate 65%)
Job Description
Mobile apps are defining the way the smartphones are used today. Providing customized experience of the requirements one needs in day to day life. Mobile Applications are highly in demand and there are thousands of apps released into the stores everyday. With such a huge market potential, the need for the development skills play a major role. Automating our daily operations beneath the fingertips is the beauty of the role a mobile application developer can play. The job is a perfect fit computer geeks who could change the way apps are looked into and could make it more and more lively.
Roles and Responsibilities
Develop new features and user interface for different applications.
Ensure high performance and user experience in the apps.
Detect and fix bugs and performance problems.
Work with backend developers and designers and the rest to deliver well architecture and high-quality solutions.
Design interfaces to improve user experience.
Ensure applications are designed to meet quality standards.
Research and implement new products, protocols, and applications.
Stay up-to-date on new trends.
Desired Skills
Extensive knowledge about application development.
Good understanding and knowledge about Android and IoS.
Familiarity with mobile libraries for networking.
Experience in debugging applications for bugs and errors.
Knowledge of GitHub platforms.
Understanding application development platforms.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java and C.
Knowledge regarding third-party integrations. Level - 2+years Experience
Job type - Full Time
Education

Mandatory Skills

Experience building applications for Mobile and Tablet devices.
Experience with React Native, React.js and Redux - Working experience on at least 2 projects with these technologies
Experience with libraries such as Lodash, Redux Saga/Thunk and Moment.js etc
Functional and object oriented programming and development experience with JavaScript (ES5 & ES6)
Understanding of Android and iOS operating systems.
Test driven development using either Jest, Jasmine, Karma and Expresso.
strong Azure, Node.js and Rest API skills, frameworks available for Node JS
Strong proficiency with JavaScript
Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and work around.

Good to Have Skills

Hands-on experience in iOS / Android
Knowledge of Azure / AWS / GCP
Understanding of performance testing and optimization techniques
Familiarity with usability concepts within mobile design
Experience with the Systems Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Other mobile development experience (HTML5/CSS/JavaScript)
Knowledge of Git Repository, Jira and VSTS
Experience in NoSql Databases such as MongoDB, CosmosDB etc.

Responsibilities

Design, development, testing and implementation of software solutions designed for mobile devices
Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
Working closely with the product and UX Team to work on user experience optimization

strong Azure, Node.js and Rest API skills, frameworks available for Node JS
Strong proficiency with JavaScript
Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and work around.
 
Hands-on experience in iOS / Android
Knowledge of Azure / AWS / GCP
Understanding of performance testing and optimization techniques
Familiarity with usability concepts within mobile design
Experience with the Systems Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Other mobile development experience (HTML5/CSS/JavaScript)
Knowledge of Git Repository, Jira and VSTS
Experience in NoSql Databases such as MongoDB, CosmosDB etc.
 
Design, development, testing and implementation of software solutions designed for mobile devices
Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs

Role: Senior Mobile App Developer
Siemens founded the new business unit Siemens Advanta (formerly known as Siemens IoT Services) on April 1, 2019 with its headquarter in Munich, Germany. It has been crafted to unlock the digital future of its clients by offering end-to-end support on their outstanding digitalization journey. Siemens Advanta is a strategic advisor and a trusted implementation partner in digital transformation and industrial IoT with a global network of more than 8000 employees in 10 countries and 21 offices. Highly skilled and authoritative specialists offer services which range from consulting to craft & prototyping to solution & implementation and operation - everything out of one hand!
What part will you play?
We are looking for a strong mobile app developer who welcomes both engineering and maintenance tasks. The primary focus will be to implement new user interfaces and features together with automated unit and integration tests.
You will be working with our candid and collaborative team, where your knowledge and advice about application architecture and the newest mobile technologies will be highly appreciated. The code you write will need to be cleanly organized and of the highest quality. You’ll also help ensure solid application performance and an excellent user experience.
You will be part of the development team and responsible for technical deliverables with quality.
Use your skills to move the world forward!
Experience of 4 to 6 Years of Experience in Software Development and minimum 2 Years of experience in Mobile Application Development.
Must have knowledge and hands-on experience in Hybrid mobile app development frameworks like Ionic, hands-on experience in Angular, Capacitor, Cordova, iOS development, Android development.
Good Exposure in HTML5 / CSS / TypeScript / JavaScript, CI/CD tools, Code Analysis, and Test automation and experience in consuming RESTful services.
An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech with 4 to 6 Years of Proven experience in Mobile Application Development.
Knowledge and experience of UI and UX standard methodologies for web applications.
Understanding of micro-services architecture, and the role of REST services is essential.
Exposure of development best practices, architectural concepts, and relevant design pattern
Make your mark in our exciting world at Siemens.
This role is based in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come. We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we encourage applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and imagination and help us shape tomorrow.
Find out more about Siemens careers at: www.siemens.com/careers

job_title: Senior SW Developer - Mobile Development (Qt Developer)
listing_jobDesc:
Quality focus
 Ensure that deliverables are implemented with industry best practices and as per the defined designs.
 Accountable and responsible for adequate unit test coverage for the software in own scope as part of the implementation process to ensure early quality.
 Accountable for passing build (warnings and errors in compilation)
 Accountable and responsible to ensure that SW features are well documented using the agreed tools
 Ensure that defects are fixed according to defect process and in a timely manner
Collaboration focus
 Software Developer works as part of agile teams co-operating with other developers and testers as well as the Product Owner. SW developers carry a general awareness of team level competencies (as in “T-shaped” profiles) and processes
 Handles code reviews in the team
 Continuously looks for improvement opportunities in own area and shares them with rest of the team.
Planning focus
 Responsible for participating and actively contributing to agile ceremonies such as daily stand ups, sprint planning and quarterly planning
 Software Developer participates to backlog grooming and story estimations
At KONE, we are focused on creating an innovative and collaborative working culture where we value the contribution of each individual. Employee engagement is a key focus area for us and we encourage participation and the sharing of information and ideas. Sustainability is an integral part of our culture and the daily practice. We follow ethical business practices and we seek to develop a culture of working together where co-workers trust and respect each other and good performance is recognized. In being a great place to work, we are proud to offer a range of experiences and opportunities that will help you to achieve your career and personal goals and enable you to live a healthy and balanced life.

At KONE, we are focused on creating an innovative and collaborative working culture where we value the contribution of each individual. Employee engagement is a key focus area for us and we encourage participation and the sharing of information and ideas. Sustainability is an integral part of our culture and the daily practice. We follow ethical business practices and we seek to develop a culture of working together where co-workers trust and respect each other and good performance is recognized. In being a great place to work, we are proud to offer a range of experiences and opportunities that will help you to achieve your career and personal goals and enable you to live a healthy and balanced life.

 Ensure that deliverables are implemented with industry best practices and as per the defined designs.
 Accountable and responsible for adequate unit test coverage for the software in own scope as part of the implementation process to ensure early quality.
 Accountable for passing build (warnings and errors in compilation)
 Accountable and responsible to ensure that SW features are well documented using the agreed tools
 Ensure that defects are fixed according to defect process and in a timely manner

 Continuously looks for improvement opportunities in own area and shares them with rest of the team.

We spend up to 90 percent of our lives in buildings, and we believe that everything people do in life deserves a flawless place to do it. In a world where our fundamental health, safety and wellbeing expectations have been deeply impacted with the anxiety of a new virus, buildings should offer a haven. Ideally, a perfect place to learn. A flawless place to grow. A perfect place to prosper.
While it’s true that today’s buildings should be efficient, reliable and safe – these characteristics alone don’t enable businesses and empower people the way a true smart building can.
How do you craft the future Smart Buildings? We’re looking for the makers of tomorrow, the hardworking individuals ready to help Siemens transform entire industries, cities and even countries. Get to know us from the inside, develop your skills on the job. Join our Pune team to make difference!
What are my Job Responsibilities?
You should be able to Write clean, well-designed code.
You should be able to Carry out peer-to-peer code reviews
You should Troubleshoot, test, maintain the core of product software and databases.
You need to Contribute in all phases of development life cycle.
You Should be flexible to work on any domain/technology.
You Should follow and adhere to organization-level and project-level processes and standards.

What do I need to be Eligible for this Role?
An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/MCA/M.Tech/M.Sc or any Equivalent Degree.
3 - 6 Years of Relevant experience as a Software Developer.
2+ years in Angular 2 /Ionic (Knowledge of all versions would be good to have).
In-depth knowledge of components, directives, services, forms.
Demonstrable knowledge of HTML5, CSS.
Ability to convert UX designs into deliverables.
Experience of developing web and mobile responsive applications.
Good understanding of REST API integration.
Experience in writing unit tests.
Clean and efficient coding practices.

We Will Prefer candidates with below skills:
Having working experience in Android along with iOS.
Knowledge/Experience of RxJS, NgRx, Angular Material,
Experience with Gitlab CI
Experience of deploying mobile applications on Playstore / App store.
Should be able to integrate chart libraries & plugins
Should be able to design project structure based on requirements.
Having working experience in Hybrid Mobile App (Cordova, Ionic).

Make your mark in our exciting world at Siemens.
This role is primarily based at Pune. However, you may get the opportunity to visit other locations within India as and when the work demands.
We’ve got quite a lot to offer. How about you?
We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality and we encourage applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us craft tomorrow.
Find out more about Siemens careers at: https://new.siemens.com/global/en/company/jobs.html
